meanings.sent1: The ellipticity of the planet's orbit fascinated the astronomers.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully studied the ellipticity of the circle she was drawing.
meanings.sent3: The ellipticity of the basketball court made the game more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves had an ellipticity that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The ellipticity of the moon's path across the sky was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is elliptical.
meanings.sent1: The ellipticity of the egg shape was perfect for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the ellipticity of the galaxy to understand its structure.
meanings.sent3: The ellipticity of the pancake made it look like a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The ellipticity of her argument left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The ellipticity of the cloud formation was a rare sight in the sky.
